[@id:232737]
According to the cumulative prospect theory,
==
people are risk averse when there is a low probability of a loss.
--
people are risk seeking when there is a high probability of a loss.

bit.body:
According to the cumulative prospect theory,
==
people are risk averse when there is a low probability of a loss.
--
people are risk seeking when there is a high probability of a loss.
